name: Greater Restoration
extras: diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes
description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target's exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target:One effect that charmed or petrified the targetOne curse, including the target's attunement to a cursed magic itemAny reduction to one of the target's ability scoresOne effect reducing the target's hit point maximum
